distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for jdom fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2021-33813: Fixed XXE issue in SAXBuilder can cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request (bsc#1187446).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An XXE issue in SAXBuilder in JDOM through 2.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
